name: auto-memoize
description: Memoize function with predifined caching strategies

scripts.build: npm run delete:target && npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run test:coverage && npm run babel
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm run copy && npm publish target/js-babel
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm run copy && npm publish target/js-babel
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm run copy && npm publish target/js-babel

author: Pavel Surinin <pavel.surinin@gmail.com>
